Name: Neural responses to naturalistic clips of behaving animals in two different task contexts
Acknowledgments: We thank Jason Gors, Kelsey G. Wheeler J. Swaroop Guntupalli, Matteo Visconti di Oleggio Castello, M. Ida Gobbini, Terry Sacket, and the rest of the DBIC (Dartmouth Brain Imaging Center) personnel for assistance in data collection/curation.
